Sasuke hits the opponent under the chin with the hilt of his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Sasuke Uchiha)|sword]]. Then he kicks them thrice sending them further into the air. As the opponent plummets to the ground, Sasuke appears where they are about to fall and hits them powerfully in the gut, sending them crashing into whatever's on the way.
